SingleSessionApp

% This app demonstrates usage of Widgets Toolbox functionality for:
% - Managing an app's figure (inherited from uiw.abstract.AppWindow)
% - Storing of preferences (inherited from uiw.abstract.AppWindow)
% - Managing session save/load and file menu logic (inherited from uiw.abstract.SingleSessionApp)
% - Separated Presentation and Model-View-Controller (MVC) design
% - Separate packages and classes for view and model/controller components
% - Use of events, listeners, and notifications to implement an
% observer synchronization pattern for view updates.
% - Recommended MATLAB coding practices
% GUI Layout Toolbox is required to run this App
if isempty( ver('layout') ) || verLessThan('layout','2.3')
com.mathworks.addons.AddonsLauncher.showDetailPageInExplorerFor(...
'e5af5a78-4a80-11e4-9553-005056977bd0','AO_CONSULTING');
error('Please install GUI Layout Toolbox before running demoApp.m');
end
% Launch the app
app = demoAppPkg.view.App();
%NOTE - You need to load data from the menu "Data" -> "Load Data..."!
